attributes.additional_details:
This is a formal petition to declare a vote of no confidence in the current governing body of the sport of Rugby League. A call for a full and detailed enquiry into the Rugby Football League (RFL) and its operations. The ambiguity and inconsistent approach to rules and regulations. The conflict of interest and bias applied to Bradford Bulls Rugby Club and their removal from the competition on a basis of no confidence.
The resignation of the board of directors of the RFL and its subsequent restructure.
